SEARCH
Package com.projectps.buildingmanagement.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.projectps.buildingmanagement.services.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
This service class provides various functionalities related to user management.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      @Autowired public UserService(UserRepository userRepository, @Value("${authorization.token1}") String authorizationToken1, @Value("${authorization.token2}") String authorizationToken2)
      Constructs a new UserService with the specified UserRepository and authorization tokens.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - the repository for accessing user data
      authorizationToken1 - the first part of the authorization token
      authorizationToken2 - the second part of the authorization token

  • Method Details

    • sendEmailToUser

      public void sendEmailToUser(UserDTO userDTO, String emailSubject, String emailBody, String authorizationToken1, String authorizationToken2)
      Sends an email to the user with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - the user DTO containing user information
      emailSubject - the subject of the email
      emailBody - the body of the email
      authorizationToken1 - the first part of the authorization token
      authorizationToken2 - the second part of the authorization token
      Throws:
      EmailSendingException - if there is an error sending the email

    • login

      public UserDTO login(String username, String password) throws UserNotFoundException
      Logs in a user with the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      the logged-in user DTO
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the currently logged-in user.

      the user DTO

      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found

      public UserDTO updateUser(UUID id, UserDTO userDTO) throws UserNotFoundException
      Updates an existing user.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to update
      userDTO - the user DTO containing updated information
      Returns:
      the updated user DTO
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found
